page.title: 10AMENITIES 1 Shops in Reeth
page.content: { {Food Shops:- There are two general grocery shops,which sell most of food that you might need.They are especially busy in the summer time when there are a lot of tourists about.There is a Butcher's shop which sells all kinds of raw meat and cooked meat and pies. {Tourist and Gift Shops:-} There is a sweet and gift shop on the High Row, and the Mews Crafts Shop just up the side of the front .The Kitchen Shop sells Hardware and cooking Utensils.The Gallery sells and exhibits paintings and pottery as well as other gifts.The Pot Shop sells pottery that has been made locally. {The Post Office:- The Post office provides allthe usual facilities and sells stationary as well.
